scripts.build:declaration: tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir build && tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir build/cjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "Publish should be run in build directory" && exit 1
scripts.build: yarn build:esmodule && yarn build:commonjs && yarn build:declaration && yarn build:packagejson
scripts.build:esmodule: BABEL_MODULES=esmodule BABEL_ENV=build babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir build --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-copy-ignored --copy-files
scripts.build:commonjs: BABEL_MODULES=commonjs BABEL_ENV=build babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir build/cjs --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-copy-ignored --copy-files
